questions.question: What is the first action required to begin Core Network deployment using the automatic approach?

answers.a: Select all Network Functions manually from the panel
answers.b: Click the One-Click Deploy button on the top toolbar

explanations.a: Incorrect. Manual selection is part of manual deployment.
explanations.b: Correct. Automatic deployment starts by clicking the One-Click Deploy button.
explanations.c: Incorrect. gNB configuration occurs after core deployment.
explanations.d: Incorrect. UE is started later in the procedure.

questions.question: During automatic Core Network deployment, which component is deployed first?

explanations.a: Incorrect. AMF is deployed after the Service Bus.
explanations.b: Incorrect. NRF is not the first component.
explanations.c: Correct. The Service Bus is deployed first.
explanations.d: Incorrect. UPF is deployed later in the sequence.

questions.question: Which of the following Network Functions is NOT listed as part of the automatic Core Network deployment?

explanations.a: Incorrect. AUSF is part of the core deployment.
explanations.b: Incorrect. PCF is included in the deployment list.
explanations.c: Correct. gNB is deployed separately after the core network.
explanations.d: Incorrect. UDR is deployed as part of the core.

questions.question: What visual behavior confirms that Core Network deployment is progressing successfully?

answers.a: All Network Functions appear instantly on the canvas
answers.b: Network Functions appear one by one on the topology view
answers.c: Only logs are generated without topology updates
answers.d: The topology remains empty until completion

explanations.a: Incorrect. Deployment is sequential, not instantaneous.
explanations.b: Correct. Network Functions appear one by one during deployment.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Topology updates visually during deployment.

questions.question: Which configuration details are mandatory when deploying the gNB?

explanations.a: Incorrect. DNN is related to UE subscription.
explanations.b: Correct. gNB requires a valid IP address and port.
explanations.c: Incorrect. UE identity is not configured at gNB.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Service Bus is part of core deployment.

questions.question: Which action allows you to view the list of registered UEs in the system?

answers.b: Select UDR and click Show Subscriber Info

explanations.a: Incorrect. Starting UE does not display UE records.
explanations.b: Correct. UDR provides subscriber information via Show Subscriber Info.
explanations.c: Incorrect. gNB does not store UE subscription data.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Restarting the Service Bus is unrelated.

questions.question: Where are UE subscription parameters such as DNN modified?

explanations.a: Incorrect. UE must match UDR, but changes are not made there first.
explanations.b: Incorrect. AMF does not store subscription data.
explanations.c: Correct. UE subscription parameters are edited in UDR.
explanations.d: Incorrect. gNB does not manage subscriptions.

questions.question: After modifying UE subscription details in the UDR, what confirms that the update was successful?

explanations.a: Incorrect. UE does not restart automatically.
explanations.b: Correct. A confirmation message indicates successful save.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Topology refresh is not required.

questions.question: Why must the UE configuration exactly match the updated UDR subscription data?

answers.b: To allow successful UE registration and operation
answers.d: To speed up Core Network deployment

explanations.b: Correct. Mismatched data causes registration failure.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Service Bus load is unaffected.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Core deployment is already completed.

questions.question: Which observation confirms that the UE is operating successfully within the network?

answers.b: UE registers successfully and remains active
answers.c: The UDR subscriber list becomes empty

explanations.a: Incorrect. UI behavior does not confirm success.
explanations.b: Correct. Successful registration and operation confirm success.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Service Bus restart is unnecessary.
